creator: jeremias@apache.org
text:
TTF Fonts configured without XML font metrics file are always embedded as CID fonts. They are generated as single byte fonts if the font is not embedded (because FOP doesn't currently support non-embedded CID fonts). This may need to be made configurable to force single byte handling for certain cases.

See http://markmail.org/message/2dakokitggdrf4vn (and replies)
resetting P2 open bugs to P3 pending further review
creator: gadams@apache.org
